DOC.brief_title: Relatively Healthy Male Veterans Observed Over Time See What Types Diseases Develop
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study gather mixed racial group relatively healthy male Veterans ( example , White , African-American , Hispanic ) , least 50 year age . These men follow see type disease develop determine racial difference lifestyle , blood test result , gene relate type disease find . Diseases particular interest prostate cancer , cancer , cardiovascular disease ( example , heart attack stroke ) , high blood pressure diabetes . The group follow consist 16,000 men recruit 40 VA Medical Centers across country . Each man follow least five year depend enters study . Participants ask complete set form provide brief medical history , demographic , information lifestyle physical activity , smoking , drinking , information diet , information quality life . Subjects see biannual basis follow-up telephone interview conduct intervening year . Follow-up telephone interview conduct MAVERIC Call Center follow-up clinic visit take place SELECT site . In addition , VA clinical administrative database use augment follow-up confirm report event . During follow-up visit , participant ask whether experienced medical event since last study visit , information specific diagnose include prostate cancer , lung cancer , colon cancer , cancer , stroke , myocardial infarction , hypertension , diabetes mellitus , kidney disease , chronic prostatitis , benign prostatic hypertrophy . Confirmation self-reported diagnosis make examination discharge summary , medical record , available diagnostic laboratory information end-points committee . Recruitment observational cohort proceed parallel recruitment SELECT use SELECT staff resource little additional burden cost staff time .
DOC.criteria: relatively healthy male Veterans least 50 year old Life expectancy least 5 yr
